import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import {FaDollarSign} from 'react-icons/fa' import products from '../products' import Rating from './Rating' const Product = ({product}) => { const {_id, image, name, rating, numReviews, price} = product; return ( {name}
${price} ) } export default Product
